feed.title: Voyager Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Voyager: 2.19.0
entry.content:
this one has a lot of stuff so good luck (and sorry) ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

but the big one is... USER TAGS.

This one will probably take a few days to hit the stores as I run more regression testing. I will try to make it available on Testflight shortly. PWA users should already be prompted to update. :)

The highlights for users:

  • User tags (enable in Settings!) including RES-style vote tracking
  • Better app performance.
  • And tons of bugfixes. (Hopefully not too many regressions!)

Lots of stuff behind the hood:

  • revamped release process allowing testflight and android test groups to get latest build from main (coming soon).
  • Also the entire build is done inside Github Actions instead of Appflow, which means better build transparency.
  • Upgraded to use cutting edge React 19 [experimental] + React Compiler.
  • And obviously lots of refactoring.

TAGS TAGS TAGS TAGS TAGS

Add text tags. Track how you've voted on users over time (literally the same coloring as RES). Tracking the source comment/post of where you originally tagged. It's all there.

Also iOS has a beautiful color picker Voyager takes advantage of that can save your color selections. Android has one too but it's meh in comparison.

What's Changed

  • Fix user ban with expiration by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1629
  • chore: Add react compiler linting by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1630
  • chore: Add useEffectEvent, react compiler, upgrade react to experimental by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1632
  • (chore) Remove forwardRef by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1634
  • (chore) Upgrade node version, remove duplicate rule by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1635
  • Refactor person actions, add send message button to long press person by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1636
  • (chore) Upgrade pnpm, remove pinned patch version by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1637
  • Add post title to document title by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1638
  • Fix community page title cut off when viewing moderated community by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1639
  • Fix loading, failed states for direct messages by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1640
  • Fix various private message bugs, improve autofocus on "send message"‚Ä¶ by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1641
  • Fix item button styles, profile page with large font sizes by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1643
  • Add more compiler fixes by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1646
  • Tagging by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1542
  • (chore) Refactor eslint config, add sortable imports with "#" absolute resolve by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1647
  • Fix flakey tests (daylight savings) by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1648
  • Upgrade dependencies by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1649
  • (chore) Ignore harmless wyw-in-js issues by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1650
  • Update CommunitySelectorModal API query to use global limit by @kminardo in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1653
  • (chore) Ban useIonToast by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1654
  • Fix incorrect CSS priority by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1655
  • (chore) Use PropsWithChildren by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1656
  • Add compiler fixes, misc by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1657
  • GitHub actions continuous deployment by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1651
  • (chore) Add @capacitor/keyboard patch for quicker opening keyboard, remove JS workaround by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1660
  • (chore) Remove lodash, add radashi by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1659
  • (chore) Add eslint rule to enforce Radashi import style by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1661
  • (chore) Ignore web haptics unavailable error by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1662
  • Remove redundant spinner when switching profiles by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1663
  • Add final user tags feature work by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1664
  • Fix hidden posts feed broken when any posts are removed by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1667
  • (chore) Remove unused deps by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1668
  • Update browserslist by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1669
  • Fix strikethrough in titles by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1670
  • Add more user tag changes (part 3?) by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1671
  • Upgrade dependencies by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1672
  • Fix blurry lemmy v0.19.6 images by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1666
  • Fix http redgifs link not working by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1674
  • Add es-toolkit, remove radashi by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1675
  • (chore) Add eslint rules for consistent interface and React component‚Ä¶ by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1665
  • Fix inline markdown styles for post context of comments by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1676
  • Disable Google üí© that breaks reproducible builds by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1679
  • Fix account switching double loading indicator, cleanup backup logic by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1678
  • (chore) Update compiler config by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1680
  • Fix lone body image handling with emoji word in title by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1681
  • Fix show read setting breaking Voyager post hiding by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1682
  • (chore) Upgrade lemmy-js-client by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1684
  • Add abortable feed support by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1645
  • chore: Add perfectionist, remove prettier-plugin-sort-imports by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1687
  • Remove enable tags text by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1688
  • chore: Remove a bunch of manual optimizations by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1689
  • chore: Upgrade deps by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1690
  • chore: Remove more useCallback, useMemo from compiled components by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1691
  • chore: Sync vite with tsconfig paths (#) by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1693
  • Fix blank page on brand new app launch by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1695
  • Fix random community behavior in newer lemmy versions by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1692
  • chore: Cleanup manifest import by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1694
  • Improve app startup speed by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1696
  • Refactor and cleanup various toast messages by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1699
  • Add lemmy.vg instance by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1700
  • chore: New release strategy by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1701
  • chore: Confirm release script by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1702

New Contributors

  • @kminardo made their first contribution in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1653

Full Changelog: https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/compare/2.18.4...2.19.0

entry.title: New release for Voyager: 2.19.1
entry.content: Just fixed F-droid build for this release. Thanks, @sharunkumar!

entry.title: New release for Voyager: 2.19.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • ci: beta.vger.app support by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1715
  • fix: workaround for user login breaking app routing in certain cases by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1718
  • fix: ios dark mode icons not available by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1720
  • ci: always upload s3 artifacts on release by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1721

Full Changelog: https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/compare/2.19.1...2.19.2

entry.title: New release for Voyager: 2.19.3
entry.content:
üì¶ Uncategorized

  • ci: fix fdroid build, refactor web build environment
  • PR: #1722

entry.title: New release for Voyager: 2.19.4
entry.content:
This release is just for f-droid (third time is the charm?!)

Reproducible builds is hard. Especially when you rework the entire build process, lol.
